question: A large company in your area has decided to spend a certain amount of money, either to sponsor a local children's sports team for two years, or to pay for two open-air concerts. It has asked for feedback from the general public.Write a letter to the company. In your letter:- describe the benefits of sponsoring the sports team- summarise the benefits of paying for the concerts- say how you think the company should spend some mone
text: I  am excited to know about your's sponsoring of our community. As you mentioned, I would like to inform you that our kids are very poor at sports despite the biggest ground in the town. Hence, If you can sponsor  the team in the next two years and they may perform in a phenomenal way  all the way. In addition, everyone will get motivated toward sports eventually, and their physical fitness will be increased which is a good sign for our society.

On the other hand, concerts will bring everyone together regardless of status and region. However, I strongly believe that this would be a fun event for all of us. Furthermore, these events will encourage  new talent and create a well-established platform to showcase their mind-blowing skills along with mesmerizing dances too.

As you know, Sports will be provided incalculable strength to our next generations which is much needed by all of us. Hence, Undoubtedly, we need to think of sports and basic facilities which bring  swift growth in their career. On the other hand, these things may play a big role throughout their life.
I would really appreciate it if you could consider sponsoring  the sports event. I look forward to hearing a response with good news soon. Hope it will come soon.
